visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include the monthly average temperatures for a year. Custom colors should be applied to the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has custom margins to ensure proper spacing around the chart area. The title of the chart is styled with a dark gray color, bold font, and a size of 20px. The x-axis represents the months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius with similarly styled labels and a title. The data series includes the monthly average temperatures for a year, with a custom color of pink (#FF6384) applied to the series. The legend is enabled and styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 14px.
